attributes.additional_details: Should limits on social contact be abolished, it is absurd to keep university lectures and/ or seminars online. Students are paying full tuition fees and receiving minimal in- person contact hours at the discretion of the university. The government must take action and ensure that all teaching is delivered in person for as long as no legal social contact limits apply. Students are frustrated, lonely and have been pushed aside for the entirety of the pandemic. It is time to take action.
attributes.background: Demand that both lectures and seminars are to be in person.

rejection.details:
This is a decision for individual universities.  You might like to sign this petition instead
